thread.title: Patricia Davis
thread.title_full: Optima Tax Relief reviewed by Patricia Davis

author: Patricia Davis
title: Patricia Davis
text: Optima saved us money, and helped us regain our sense of honesty. We were never in a criminal situation, but non-compliance can demoralize one quickly. Optima helped us regain our dignity and gave us our sense of self-confidence back. We would recommend them to anyone with tax problems!!!
